attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To say the majority of Brits are none-smokers, may be right "BUT" the majority of PUB GOERS are smokers.
The smoking ban came in during summer, and most people just accepted it as another invation of our democracy.
BUT summer has gone and going outside from a warm pup into the cold and often rainy open air half a dozen times in an evening for a smoke is also a danger to heath.
I work in a Pub and use 3 others when I socialise and all of them have more smokers sat outside than they have non-smokers inside.
TIME TO SIGN THE PETITION TO ALLOW LAND LORDS THE RIGHT TO CHOOSE IF THEY WANT A SMOKE FREE PUB OR NOT.
PLEASE SIGN
